Title: Out on a Limb
Plot: Just as Michael's relationship with Sally starts to flourish, Maggie Lizer returns nine months pregnant, and Michael immediately assumes he's the father. George Michael attempts to break up with Ann, and Buster learns he's being deployed to Iraq.
GuestStars: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Christine Taylor, Dave Martel, Gerry Del Sol, Maggie Rowe, Becky Thyre, Rick Hall, Jerry Minor, Jay Johnston
